headline: Jefferies and Mizuho Raise Williams Companies (WMB) Price Targets
summary: The Williams Companies, Inc. (NYSE:WMB) is one of the 12 Best Oil and Gas Stocks to Buy Right Now. On February 2, Jefferies increased its price target on The Williams Companies, Inc. (NYSE:WMB) from $71 to $76 and kept its Buy rating. Jefferies expects the company to announce medium-term adjusted EBITDA growth guidance of 8% […]
